title: About Us
subtitle: Learn about our mission and vision

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: We are committed to providing users with simple, efficient, and professional image processing tools. Through advanced technology and exceptional user experience, we enable everyone to easily process images and enjoy a clean, watermark-free experience. We believe technology should make life better, not more complicated.

story.title: Our Story
story.content: Our team consists of passionate professionals with expertise in technology and design. We deeply understand the image processing challenges users face in their daily work and life. Therefore, we developed this smart watermark remover to make complex image processing simple and intuitive. Since 2024, we have helped thousands of users successfully process their images, earning widespread recognition and positive reviews. This positive feedback motivates us to continuously improve our product and provide better services to users.

quality.title: Quality First
quality.desc: We pursue excellence in product quality, ensuring every feature is rigorously tested

userFirst.title: User First
userFirst.desc: User needs drive us forward, we listen to every piece of feedback

privacy.title: Privacy Protection
privacy.desc: We strictly protect user data and never misuse or disclose any information

innovation.title: Continuous Innovation
innovation.desc: We constantly explore new technologies to bring users better experiences

team.title: Our Team
team.content: We have a passionate professional team including senior engineers, designers, and product managers. Every member is dedicated to creating the best product experience.

future.title: Looking Forward
future.content: We will continue to optimize product features, explore more image processing possibilities, and bring users more practical tools and services.
